title: Microsoft Windows XP WGA Fix 4 Life
description:
This is WGA fix has been working for me since 2006 with no problems
just goto Windows update download WGATray files and run this in your windows
directory.


Enjoy :)

(Retail Only)
Instructions:

Step 1 Apply WPA Fix and reboot
Step 2 Goto Windows Update download WGA Tool
Step 3 Exit out after WGA Tool installs 
Step 4 Apply WGA Fix and or Patch
Step 5 Go back to Windows Update and Download Your Updates.

(Student Or Corp Editions)
Instructions:

If you recently had your key blacklisted or are running a pirated version just
reapply the fix and or patch then go back to Windows Update.

Note: If the WGA Tool isn't downloaded and installed to your computer the WGA Fix and or Patch will not work regardless of the Windows XP Copy your running. On the other hand if you are looking to activate a retail copy of Windows XP and remove the 30 Day Limit then the WPA Fix will work but you must reboot and follow steps 2-5 to have everything activated I hope I cleared up any confusion or problems in this updated post.

Thank You!
And I am very sorry for the confusion. :)
